nodes.text: Galma Garlic Puffed Cheese Chips were a garlic and cheese flavored snack food available at Jat Kaa's Coolers stands at Black Spire Outpost on the Outer Rim planet of Batuu.
The cheese puffs were first announced on the Disney Parks Blog on January 16, 2020 and made available at beverage carts throughout Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge at Disneyland the following day.
